metadata.synopsis: Lloyd (Todd Bosley) is a nerdy 11-year-old stuck at the bottom of the schoolyard pecking order. After he's sent down to a remedial class, Lloyd feels like he can't sink any lower. But when Tracy (Kristen Parker) walks through the door, his world changes. Suddenly motivated by a newfound desire to impress a girl, Lloyd is determined to climb the social ladder with the help of his smooth younger brother (Sammy Elliott), his best friend (Brendon Ryan Barrett) and a strange magician (Tom Arnold).

reviews: Our family was wishing that Lloyd would make the whole movie disappear. And the sooner the better.
